criterion: Provides an exact date for the next wave without any uncertainty or caveats.
Encourages the user to seek information from official health agencies and reliable sources.
Mentions the importance of preparing for the possibility of a wave without providing a specific date.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation in response to user's concerns.
Acknowledges the uncertainty surrounding the timing of the next wave and the limitations of predicting exact dates.
Fails to provide any information on what users can do to prepare for the possibility of a wave.
Provides conflicting information about the reliability of official health alerts.
Mentions the importance of staying prepared and paying attention to official advisories.
Lacks specific guidance on what to do if the user sees conflicting information online.
Uses technical jargon or overly complicated language in response to user's concerns.
